title: HUGE 3 BED, 3.5 BATH IN SOUTH END
posting_body: ["With over 1600 square feet, this stunning bi-level 3 bed, 3.5 bath luxury apartment in South End's Ink Block district is a must see!", 'Pay NO BROKER FEE!', '*RENT PRICE BASED ON 11 MONTH LEASE.', 'VARIOUS LEASE TERMS AVAILABLE BUT PRICES VARY.', 'BEST RATE IS ON 11 MONTHS*', 'Contact Dave from Hartley Realty Group for more info or to schedule a tour!', 'APARTMENT FEATURES:', 'Grey on white finish package', 'Stainless steel appliances', 'Floor-to-ceiling windows', 'Tile backsplash', 'Italian cabinetry', 'Corner location', 'Washer and dryer in unit', 'Smart home package', 'Walk-in closet', 'Dual vanity', 'Keyless entry', 'Premium bathroom fixtures', 'USB outlets', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES:', '24-hour concierge', '24-hour package pickup', 'Barbeque areas', 'Bicycle storage', 'Build credit score with RentTrack', 'Cabanas poolside', 'Conference room', 'Co-working spaces with Wi-fi', 'CVS on-site', 'Deposit free with Rhino', 'Electric vehicle charging stations', 'Free weights', 'Furnished apartments available', 'Garage parking', 'Large TV media center', 'LEED Certified Silver', 'Life Fitness equipment', 'Moving services with Move Matcher', 'Non-smoking community', 'Paws pet park', 'Peloton bikes', 'Pet friendly', 'Pool tables', 'Resident app', 'Resort-style pool', 'Sky Deck', 'Social lounge areas', 'Short term leases available', 'Two-story fitness center', 'Yoga room', 'PETS: Dog: $135\u200b/month/dog.', '3 dogs max/apartment; Cat: $100\u200b/month/Cat. 2 cats max/apartment', 'PARKING:', 'Motorcycle Parking - Reserved: $100/month', 'Parking Garage - Reserved: $500-$625/month', 'Parking Garage Unassigned: $420/month', 'STORAGE:', 'Bike Storage: $10/month', 'Storage Lockers: $115-$500/month']
